Helper to message user about adding the bbi directory to $PATH

Source: R/use-bbi.R
add_to_path_message.Rd

Will return invisibly if .bbi_path is the same as getOption('bbr.bbi_exe_path') or if dirname(.bbi_path) is already in $PATH

add_to_path_message(.bbi_path)

Arguments

.bbi_path

absolute path to the new bbi

Contents
